name: The North Face Beyond The Wall Jacket - Women's
description: When fighting pre-workout chills or hanging on to that post-workout warmth, this jacket has you covered. Crafted from a lightweight woven material the Beyond the Wall Jacket is easy to pack and adds just the right amount of warmth for those crisp morning sessions.Standard fit feels like it should, no surprises.Soft, woven polyesters gets the addition of FlashDry-XD™ improving wicking and reducing drying times.Woven polyester is light and packs well.Adjustable hood and hem help you seal out the elements.Zippered pockets keeps small necessities safe.Articulated patterning increases your freedom of movement.Eye-catching reflective logo on back right shoulder helps keep you seen.
